WorkItem.Description:
When I look in the API reference included with each release for PHPExcel, it seems that the description for all methods gets repeated.
 
Example:
 
method getFreezePane [line 1388]
 
string getFreezePane( )
 
Get Freeze Pane
Get Freeze Pane <---- why this again ??
 
It's not a so big problem, just wondering why this is happening?
 
----
Environment: PHPExcel 1.6.4 (release)
WorkItem.Summary: Description of methods are written twice in API documentation

Comments.Message: Hmm... will have to check if PHPDoc is doing strange stuff next time...
